case.state: Yo, thanks for the invite! I don't really seem like a poker player, do I? Yeah, I'll admit I prefer physical stuff.
Heyo! We probably haven't met. I'm Chie!
Allllright! I'm raring to go!
What the heck? You look so much like me!
Hey your name is the same as- ugh!
Whoa, man, should I be here? I kinda feel out of place.
Don't underestimate me! I know how to defend myself!
W-wait, hold on, what are you supposed to be?
Did you come from the shadow world?
Whoever you are, I can tell you're bad news. I've got my eye on you.
Wait, don't tell me, it's something totally fancy like Esmarelda, isn't it?
Is it some simple nickname like "Teddie"?
(Something tells me this girl is bad news...)
Hey doesn't your dad own that burger chain? I love that place!
Shit, uh, be careful with that gun, ok?
I shouldn't be surprised with guns since detective prince Naoto uses one but that looks like bad news.
From what I've seen in pictures Scotland reminds me a bit of Inaba. It's neat to play against someone from there.
So, anyone else not understand what she's saying?
Wow, wrestling? Now that's something I gotta try!
You're good with your legs and yet our fighting styles are different. What do you call yours?
Uh oh, I smell trouble with this girl.
(I don't like the sound of this. Whenever someone says they want to play, it almost never goes well...)
What a coincidence. I just hope you aren't as perverted as our Yosuke.
Oh, thank goodness. If you were our Rise, the inventory would be swarming with crazy fans.
♫ Now I face out, I hold out, I reach out to the truth of my life, seeking to seize on the whole moment to now break away... ♪
Gosh, it's so quiet in here. I kinda like it.
Look at us! We could form our own basketball team!
Wah-- g-ghost!
W-wait! Why am I the only girl here?
Let's step on up to the plate! I'm gonna crush the competition!
I never back down from a challenge, so bring it on! Hwataa!
Haha, I'm sure this will be fun, like, I can't say why I was so repulsed about stripping back in high school. Don't worry about me.
The body is a temple. I will hone its mind.
None for me! I can make this work.
Let's see... I'll exchange ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
This should be enough.
You know what to do, dealer!
I just need ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
Go! ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~!
All I need is a chance.. ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~!
Uhhh. ~cards.text~ card~cards.ifplural(s|)~.
How about ~cards.text~ card~cards.ifplural(s|)~?
It's all up to me now.
I'm starting to get the hang of this.
Just like that!
Hey, Yuno, you’re great at card games, right? Is this hand good?

Oh yeah! Try and beat my pair--
Eh, I mean, forget I said that, hahaha...
Phew, still in it.
Just goes to show that I don't go down that easily!
It'll take more than that to bring me down!
I need a miracle...
Perfect! Just as I planned.
Perfect!
Will this be enough?
My lucky tank top strikes again!
Another great hand! You can't beat the lucky tank!
♫ Every day's great at your Junes! ♪ Aw, damn it, it's stuck in my head again.
Hm, if Naoto were here right now, she might have given me some pointers with her cardboard box tone. She's not one for friendly encouragement.
I've actually never gone to a kung fu dojo myself. I've mostly learned through imitating what I see on TV.
Nice! Gotta hand it to you, dealer.
Thanks, dealer! I owe you some steak for this.
Yes! On the happiness scale, this is up there with watching action movies...
Could this be any more awesome?
Pretty good move, huh? Wait-- did that reveal anything?
I'll end my turn. Your move!
Two separate pairs. Is this the full house? Alright, try and beat that!
This is fine. It should only get better from here.
The TV room in Junes is usually so empty that we could've played there instead.
This should be good enough to win, but I can't be too sure.
Total disclaimer, I'm way more brawn than brains.
After this, maybe I'll hit up the food court at Junes again. It's a great after-party spot after all.
Huh.
Hey, would anyone be up for an after-party when we're done? I was thinking holding it at Junes the department store.
In all honesty, we've been standing around a lot so I'm gonna have to loosen up again.
Okay, I can make this work.
It's like studying for an exam. You just need to not fail.
Maybe some filet mignon will do after this. It's got a great taste while still buffing you up.
You know, I was worried I'd have to go easy, but I'm glad you've been keeping up.
This'll be okay!
Hey, wait! He didn't say "Uno"!
Not good! Protect me, Tomoe!
Just girls? That's a relief. Nothing crazy today.
Don't think that I'm a guy just because my hair is short like yours.
No way!
Could it get any worse?
What the heck...
Where's Rise when you need her? Her support always get us out of jams like this.
C-crap! I knew I swapped out the wrong card!
(So it's gonna be one of those nights, huh?)
(Well, it's still early, but I can't get complacent. If I let up, I'll fall behind quick.)
Maybe it's not so bad now. After all, I'm already showing my underwear here.
Yeah, yeah, rub it in.
You're lucky I haven't completed my training yet, dealer!
I can't afford to lose now!
Well isn't that fantastic.
Hey wait, isn't there a clause that lets you swap hands? Or was that another game?
Are you kidding? I can't let this be the end!
Oh shit...
I can't even bear to look...
I'm totally screwed now!
Crud! I'm so close, too!
C'mon, Chie, focus! You don't want to get eliminated, do you?
Dunno about you guys but I'm starting to get a little hungry. I'm gonna have some beef jerky delivered. Should I get extra for you? How would you want it prepared?
A street fighting circuit sounds awesome! You guys are regulars, aren't you? How's it like?
Me? Well it's nothing too fancy, but I hope I can be a cop someday. I know, compared to you that's probably child's play.
I got a D in Geography so don't take what I said to heart, but I'm from a small town in Japan called Inaba. It's just across the ocean from here, I think?
Is the Inventory that much different? The language is certainly unqua... I mean, unique, compared to Inaba.
What the heck? Can this even be called a dance?
Needs music. Should I play Specialist?
Wow, I've seen some pretty good dancing back in high school but this is something else!
Hearing this makes me want to dance all night again!
Probably best to not let it bother you. I was the only girl on the investigation team for a while so I'm used to it.
Holy shit! She just got slammed! Call the press! Call the committee... wait-- sorry, I think I got carried away, hahaha...
She's so strong! Do I even have a chance against her?
Petra, it's your birthday? Come meet us at Junes! We'll give you a nice treat!
Hey! You can't just team up like that!
You're an expert on technology aren't you, Futaba? Maybe you have a better idea than I do.
Broski? That's not even a word!... as far as I know anyway.
Honestly, without Tomoe I'd probably be toast. It's not that I can't hold my own but the shadows are ruthless.
You're referring to the ruins of Macho Pinchu aren't you? Or was it Mustard Pikachu?
My weapon? I always just use my fists. And maybe I'll have Tomoe help out, but mostly my fists... and legs...
The mark of the dragon! No? Maybe that's just a Neo Featherman thing.
A detective? Well Inaba's detective is Yu's uncle, so we know each other pretty well. As for his sidekick Adachi, well, I better save that story for another day.
Could it be that you know about the world inside our TVs, Colress?
You're on, Ryuji!
Oh, yeah? I'm gonna make you eat your words!
We'll see about that! I'm at my best when the going gets tough!
(Who's going to tell her?)
You know, maybe I should give some more games a shot. Any recommendations, Futaba?
H-hey! You can't just leave like that!
H-hey! We're in the middle of something here!
We can leave? Since when?
Hey, don't leave! We were just getting to the good part!
When in doubt, play the soundtrack from Trial of the Dragon. I guarantee it'll get you rolling!
Can't say I like them. I'm more used to fighting them.
Just don't tell her about Mara... hey! Don't look it up either!
Oh yeah, that's definitely Kanji.
Can she do that?
Oh come on!
Aha, what's to be sorry about? I mean, it's just a story, right?
At least it was good getting my mind off the game for a bit.
Convenience store meat? I guess if it's Junes meat, you can't go wrong.
Yeah, if you want technology answers, you may want to ask Yosuke.
Great, it's King Moron's homeroom all over again.
Yukiko has been my friend for who knows how long? Probably goes back to childhood. Everyone on the team is worth protecting but she especially is someone I'll always hold dearly.
Come to think of it, I remember playing something similar. Tycoon was it?
What is this Triple Seven? Are they trying to compete with Junes? Seems like I better check it out.
Are you able to walk? I've never really seen Tokyo, but at least in Inaba, everything is close enough for us to walk to.
Now we're talking! My persona's named Tomoe, and there's nothing like kicking shadow hide with our combined strength.
I've got my persona Tomoe watching my back. Wait-- you did mean our personas, right?
I guess other than my persona Tomoe I wouldn't mind a superhero form myself. How about something like that Superman guy?
There was a killer rampaging our town and the police couldn't do anything, so it was up to me and the rest of my friends to get to the bottom of it.
Anything that even resembles a shadow.
W-wait, hold on! I'm not painting material, am I?
W-wait! I never expected that!
W-wait, are you sure? I mean, this is me we're talking about...
Well, I guess so, haha. (Wow, no one's ever asked to paint me before.)
Oh, that? Well we mostly have our personas fight them. You know, the extention of ourselves.
Did you get into any big fights? How tough were they?
Me? Nah, I've walked away from all my fights unharmed... I think.
Well, aren't you a pesky one? This one time as a kid I remember getting this really big grass stain. It was the size of my knee and was colored... oh, that's not what you meant, is it?
Aren't we all going from the same deck?
Hey! Like I'm going to make it easier for you!
You mean like a shadow world?
You're free to come with us. Just don't expect me to carry you.
Well, I dunno, It could be pretty dangerous if you don't have your own persona.
Yeah, maybe lose the naked part.
Being naked here is one thing, but in a dungeon?
You know... where is here, anyway?
Gee, and I thought I was the sensitive one...
Well, who said plain was a bad thing?
At least you don't seem dangerous. Not like any of the zombies that roam the TV world.
Nice jacket, Leonie! It feels good to tie it around your waist, doesn't it?
Come to think of it, you probably have enough battle experience to be my senpai. I hope some of your skill can rub off on me.
Who the hell starts a conversation like that? I just got here!
Why would you s-say something so proposterous?
Please a guy? I-I mean, I'm not that kind of girl, you know!
(That almost sounds like cheating. I can't imagine just being another part of someone's harem like that...)
Eheheh, this isn't normally what I do for fun, but I'll definitely do it again.
Never really expected card game players to be very fit anyway.
Who needs salt, anyway?
I like your attitude! You'll never know what you're gonna get so might as well be able to indulge in anything.
They have vegan meat now, don't they?
How about I order some rice balls instead? Or don't you guys call them donuts?
I'm gonna go with Playstation. Although I heard Teddie showed up in a Switch game. ...that was him, right?
You're cute, but please refrain from any more reminders of the boonies.
What the heck is West Virginia anyway? Isn't that the city with the green wizard?
What is West Virginia and why is there a song about it?
Your name is actually Yusuke? My bad, I mistook you for someone else.
You're a police officer? On top of being a martial artist? I hope I can be like you some day.
Oh yeah, King Moron is what we call our homeroom teacher Mr. Morooka. He really is a moron.
The world you fight in sounds oddly similar to our shadow world. But if you don't have personas, what could you be using?
I'm getting bad vibes about Cammy. It's almost as if there's some dark power controlling her...
(She'd make for a great freind too...)
Oh no you don't, Nagatoro. I see you trying to peek at my hand.
You're a navi, right? I'm a little jealous of your skills. Eh, don't tell Rise I said that.
Hmm, yeah, I can never get used to that place.
We don't have any of those bland fast food places in Inaba, but I did try it one time and their burgers are really dry. Never again.
Nagatoro, was it? I've heard a lot about you and that loud mouth of yours.
Nagatoro, was it? Well you better watch your mouth. I may not be an officer yet, but I still know when to bring justice.
Looks like clear skies. Doesn't seem like the Midnight Channel will be on tonight.
Why did we have to play in a classroom, anyway? The last place I needed to be in is back in school.
This used to be my secret hangout spot as a kid! Though, I guess our leader would always find me...
Aw man, I'm not even dressed for the part.
Who's bright idea was it to play in here?
Why play in here? I mean, it's not like we can make much noise.
I feel like I'm going to fall asleep in here. Shouldn't we have gone to the inventory?
What's up with all those beach scenes on TV anyway? I swear every tenth episode or so there's a scene where everyone visits the beach in tight bikinis. It's getting old quick.
W-wait, what are we doing here? You should have let me plan ahead if we're really having a romantic night out.
This place is amazing! Inaba doesn't have anything this lively. We have to take a bus into the next city for that.
Look at you, ~fighter~! You and I oughta spar at some point!
Have you been working out, ~fighter~? Did you get in any fights yet?
I sense some powerful energy. Another persona user?
You're not from around here, are you? What's it like where you come from?
Sorry, I kinda had a word vomit there. Just never expected to see a ghost for real, you know?
Sorry, I didn't mean to overreact earlier.
You know, ~fightern~, it probably wouldn't hurt to go for a run every now and then.
Don't you ever work out, ~fightern~? Seems like I oughta make up a routine for you.
Have you heard of Risette? She's pretty popular around Inaba.
Hey, I think I've heard of you before!
Guess that leaves you and me. I hope you're ready!
This is it, the moment we've been waiting for!
The stage is set! All we need is a ring.
Hey, didn't they make that movie about the drunk boxer where you came from?
You're American, aren't you? Is it just like they show in the movies?
I don't get why Americans are so nervous about kung fu. Instead they make movies with boxers...
At school they keep bringing up America in world history classes? What's so special about it? I mean, then again I'm not one to talk, considering the leader always bails me out.
You're still in school, huh? Should you even be here?
I'm actually glad I'm not in school again. Our leader kept bailing me out.
It's kind of amazing how my old school jacket still fits me.
I can't imagine going back to school. I used to just hang out on the rooftop a few times.
Go ahead and celebrate, Ryuji. But next round will be my turn, just you wait.
Ehehe, I just hope I don't burn the inventory down!
Wait, we're doing teams now? In that case, I'm team dragon!
Hardy har har...
Yeah yeah, rub it in.
You mean like a meatball combo? Yeah those are always nice.
A combo? Is that the supposed baton pass I've heard about?
I almost got away with it too! You and your meddling hands.
Variety? Oh, that just comes down to different seasonings and which animal the meat is coming from.
Yeah, it's usually based on seasoning and different animals. Wait, you guys don't have seasoning over there?
Yep, that's me, a real butt kicker. Hahaha... ha...
You're too kind, Kuma.
Really? I never really saw it as exclusively a boy thing.
I guess you do see a lot of boys doing it, but I still use it to stay strong. Never know when I need to use it.
Now you know how it feels!
Well, now, is the teaser being teased? How unfortunate...
Who, me? I guess I did run most of my way here, but it's nothing I can call practice.
I mean, kinda? Ever since I graduated I've mostly been working on becoming a police officer, so you could say every day at the academy is P.E. Hahaha!
Why do you ask? Is that a challenge?
If it means I can kick your ass in front of a whole stadium, why not?
(Leonie's watching. I hope I can impress her.)
Ready, Leonie? I'll show you I'm not just all bark and no bite.
Oh, shove it.
Whatever, try and stop me a second time.
Again? Fine, have it your way.
(Come on, Chie, pull it together!)
Can't be all bad, since you guys showed yours first.
About time! I was beginning to think this was too easy!
So now it's my turn! I can't blame you if you're scared.
Kept me waiting long enough... now stand back everyone!
Seriously?
Well, if I must! You won't forget this!
Alright, so now it's my turn, right? I'll take my shoes off in that case.
I was nice and cozy in my jacket but I suppose I'll humor you.
Did I say this was just a warm-up?
Damn, I don't have too much room for error here, do I?

Alright, stand back and watch this!
(Hmm, maybe that was too enthusiastic...)
Oh, my turn? No problem!
Still a comfortable lead! Just try to break me!
When training, it's important to keep it slow, but not so slow that you don't go anywhere.
That's okay. You still haven't seen my real moves!
Again? Alright then, how about my socks?
C'mon, guys, you gotta do better than that!
Y-you sure? This is me we're talking about.
Hm, I still have my skirt. Probably should have ditched that long ago.
Eh, might as well. Maybe you'll feel better about losing.
Oh geez, I don't have anything smaller to take off.
How stupid do you think I am?
Don't feel too bad about it. I would have done it sooner, but that was against the rules.
Will you stop looking already? I get it, you like my muscle tone... that's it, right?
Yeah, I kinda expected this to happen...
Nothing to worry about, right? Alright, I'm ready. Let's do this.
We've reached that point, huh? Well then, it's now or never.
W-wait, before I show them, let me prepare myself first.
(Ok, deep breaths. You got this.)
Oh, my turn? No problem!
Still a comfortable lead! Just try to break me!
When training, it's important to keep it slow, but not so slow that you don't go anywhere.
That's okay. You still haven't seen my real moves!
Again? Alright then, how about my socks?
C'mon, you gotta do better than that!
I was nice and cozy in my jacket but I suppose I'll humor you.
Did I say this was just a warm-up?
Damn, I don't have too much room for error here, do I?
Well, it was going to be my turn sooner or later.
My turn, huh? Just watch.
Seriously?
No, this can't be!
You owe me 10 meat buns for this!
Well, if I must! You won't forget this!
Alright, so now it's my turn, right? I'll take my shoes off in that case.
Will you stop looking already? I get it, you like my muscle tone... that's it, right?
Yeah, I kinda expected this to happen...
N-no! I can't believe it!
No way!! Me, of all people?!
Oh geez, I don't have anything smaller to take off.
How stupid do you think I am?
Don't feel too bad about it. I would have done it sooner, but that was against the rules.
Alright, I've been prepared for this. Here we go.
Maybe I really am this stupid, geez..
My mom did say I needed to work on my brain.
Not even a meat bun can cheer me up..
Dammit, how can I be a police officer if I can't even outlast these opponents?
Hm, I still have my skirt. Probably should have ditched that long ago.
We've reached that point, huh? Well then, it's now or never.
W-wait, before I show them, let me prepare myself first.
I lost! So that means...
How is that even possible?
And after such a good hand too!
I thought I was in the clear!
Are you guys rigging the deck?
Alright, so now it's my turn, right? I'll take my shoes off in that case.
Someone's gotta go first, I guess.

Alright, let me show you how it's done.
(Ok, Chie, try not to panic.)
Man, not my day, huh?
Did I say this was just a warm-up?
Damn, I don't have too much room for error here, do I?
Still too early for a comeback victory, but I've seen enough movies to expect that so you better be ready!
That's ok. You still haven't seen my real moves!
Again? Alright then, how about my socks?
Wait, why me? I thought I would be good at this!
Maybe I really am this stupid, geez..
My mom did say I needed to work on my brain.
Not even a meat bun can cheer me up..
Dammit, how can I be a police officer if I can't even outlast these opponents?
Hm, I still have my skirt. Probably should have ditched that long ago.
Oh geez, I don't have anything smaller to take off.
How stupid do you think I am?
Don't feel too bad about it. I would have done it sooner, but that was against the rules.
Don't blame me if you're dissapointed with what's under my tank.
Will you stop lookoing already? I get it, you like my muscle tone... that's it, right?
Yeah, I kinda expected this to happen...
N-no! I can't believe it!
No way!! Me, of all people?!
We've reached that point, huh? Well then, it's now or never.
W-wait, before I show them, let me prepare myself first.
I lost! So that means...
(Why did this have to happen so soon?)
It feels weird doing this in front of you, Sayaka.
You know, Leonie, now that I've got a good look, your shoes look pretty clunky. How do you fight in those?
Moon, I swear to god...
Geez, Moon, it's hard enough for me to do this without you being a super perv.
Got any of those visors, Oracle? I may not be able to show my face after this...
(It's weird, I've been around this ghost for so long, and yet I don't even seem that scared.)

In this corner, from the sleepy town of Inaba, the carnivore who discarded womanhood, Chie Satonaka!
(I gotta think of a better introduction.)
Wrestling is so cool! I used to watch an American league called W.T.F. and tried immitating the moves.
You're such a tease Futaba, the way you stare at us with those big eyes, how you comment like we're hentai characters...
I wish I had abs like yours, Leonie. What's your secret?
Being out here reminds me of the time I slept in my jacket during a camping trip. Normally the tents are split by gender, but Kanji took over my tent.
Are there any tall tales about the inventory? We've got plenty of those about Inaba, like the story of the girl who forgot her homework and in the bathroom mirror she saw...
See? If I can do it you can too.
I still can't believe you guys work with a talking cat thing.
Man! I barely understand how this game works. All I know about cards I learned from Steel Fists, but that scene was so boring I almost fell asleep!
You know, there was this poker scene in this movie I like! But then everyone starts arguing because they just started making up rules! Haha! Heh... heh...
You guys don't really care about shorts, right?
Don't get excited. They're just shorts.
Dammit, I was hoping it wouldn't come to this.
At least I didn't bring my Neo Featherman tank. Licensed stuff is just too valuable to get dirty.
I don't have abs like some of the other fighters, but I hope this is good enough.
This is it. No turning back.
I can't believe I'm really doing this...
G-get ready everyone, this will blow you away, hahaha…
I hope you're ready, because I'm wearing one of my favorite outfits underneath.
Is anyone here familiar with Inaba? Well, where do I begin?
Look, if you have a problem just tell me.
Hey, this isn't so bad after all! Never mind on that visor.
(Of course! I managed to overcome my fear of ghosts, so I can overcome embarassing myself too!)
Alright, Mika! Hope you're ready because I'm bringing the heat! Come forth, Tomoe!
Yeah, I know it's scripted, but who cares? Nothing like an RKO to send your enemy flying! Just like an anime!
But you know what? That's what I like about you. You're the type of person I can hang out with, even if it starts out awkward.
Great, now there's sand all over me.
We would have been caught by our chaperone King Moron if not for Yosuke sweet talking his way out of it.
...Aw man, I can't bring myself to think about it. Ghost stories are too much for me.
I still don't get the appeal...
Well, now you don't have to keep hounding me about it.
But maybe it's not too farfetched since we have a talking bear on our team.
...maybe you were the cause of it, since you're a ghost after all, heh.
Don't even think about it boys.
Maybe I should have gone with boxers.
So, u-um, how do they look?

(If I bring up a conversation maybe it'll make the others forget I'm nearly naked.)
So, did anyone catch the new Neo Featherman episode last night?
Could someone at least turn up the heat?
I-It's not like this is anything out of the ordinary, right?
Maybe I should have thought twice before I took off my shoes in a place like this.
Now I'm all warmed up! Let's start the training for real!
See? I can handle it... I hope.
Shouldn't make a difference whether my shoes are off right?
Alright, so far so good.
C-c'mon, say something! You're making me all embarassed!
D-does this... meet your expectations?
(No one's laughing. That's good.)
(Hey, I actually pulled it off! Nice! What else can I do?)
J-just don't worry about me. I'm fine! I mean, I've been training and everything!
... It's the tank top I like to dance in! Wore this when I helped Risette with her comeback concert. You know, Risette, the idol? We're close friends.
Actually, it's not too interesting. Other than the school and detective agency, Junes is the place that stands out the most. You'd never imagine there being a big mall in town and yet, there it is.
Bring it on, Yosu- I mean Yusuke!
Looks like you're up, Ryuji! As the athlete of your group, you gotta give it your all and not look back!
For someone with a pirate persona you sure aren't liking these dirty things.
Quite an interesting dialect there, Brock. Certainly not from one of those smaller scale areas like Inaba.
(~name~ is the last person we want nude...)
So, is anyone going to stop ~name~ or are we just going to let him run wild?
How about that? There was no way you were beating me! No way!
Not bad, a full house! I forget which one is better, a full house or flush...
I-- I actually won that?
Wow, thanks, ~name~! You really saved my butt this round.
Wait-- hold on...
I guess it's like they say, it's better to be lucky than to have skills. Or was it better to be an expert?
I still have no idea how I did that.
Just pretend we're all in our underwear. Oh, wait a minute...
I mean, if you want to I guess...
Score one for me!
Whenever you're ready, ~name~!
If you want to survive, you have to give it your all.
(They just have to keep knocking each other out.)
Remember your training, ~name~!
Whatever you do, don't cross the line. I can tell when you get there.
Yeah! Just keep on losing! You can't stop me!
No touching OK?
Don't be scared now, ~name~.
Not like I have anything to lose at this point. I'm ready to let loose... That sounded better in my head.
You should have done it while I still had clothes on!
Did someone lose? Hell if I can notice.
Nice! Take it off, ~name~!
Don't hold back, ~name~!
Well? We're waiting.
Better luck next time!
Here's my victory pose!
Your turn! Show us what you're made of.
Yeah! In your face, ~name~!
Did ya see that? I practically blew them away! Well, maybe that's not possible in a card game, haha! Hehhhh...
Yeah! I can't lose!
Alright! I'm really in a groove now!
Too bad. I was hoping this would be more challenging.
Rotten luck for you, huh?
Wow, you suck at this, ~name~!
Yeah, I suspected you'd be back.
You know, I never took you as the type of person who'd be this flustered.

Did you know about this the whole time, Ryuji?
Who's that? You want me to punt him?
N-no way- I mean, please! I could use the practice.
You're lucky I'm not in a position to kick your ass.
(Don't say anything, you'll only encourage her...)
(Oh crap, it's Futaba's turn? Should I look away?)
You're seriously not nervous, Futaba? Man, I wish I could be like you.
Oh yeah? Have you done this before, Futaba?
You must have a knack for this. Mind helping me out a bit?
Cute yet sexy. I couldn't imagine that being a combo.
And that's a wrap!
Oh yeah! Looks like I win!
Tough break, ~target~
Not only does this train my body to be patient, but I get to learn from ~name~ going before me.
Does this even need to be part of the game? We've already seen you naked, after all.
I mean it's not like we were gambling money away.
Holy shit... what a scene we've created.
Finally someone to join me.
Just do what I did before.
Now let's see if she does anything differently...
I did my part, dude. Now do yours.
Well, you've got me. Now you have no excuse for holding back.
Oh, well uh, never mind, then.
Who's this instructor you keep bringing up? The only person I know of like that is Yu, our leader.
Look out for those shadows, Hermoine!
She's a shadow!
W-what?! What the hell?!
How did she-- I've seen some crazy shit in the shadow world but this takes the cake!
It's too late to distract myself with a meat bun. Might as well enjoy it.
(If I look and nothing happens, my composure will improve! I better watch.)
And off she goes...
Don't even think about keeping us from looking,
Don't forget you're front and center for this, ~name~.
Damn, I got off too early.
Hey, at least I can watch without any distractions.
Well, kung fu techniques, yes, but- this is different!
How did this... never mind.
Oh, that was your own doing? My bad.
You're making this a lot harder than it needs to be...
Sheesh!
Where did this horniness come from anyway?
The only comforting thing is I'll make it out of this unscaved...
If anything, you've made it less likely for me to finger you.
Yeah right...
Just get it over with!
You probably wouldn't last too long anyway
You're putting some unpleasant imagery in my head.
(sigh)
Is she having trouble? Maybe I should-- no, wait, I better focus on myself first.
(The way her boobs squish as she masturbates is so hypnotizing...)
Is it considered my type if I like big boobs? That's just expected isn't it?
Sheesh, still at it?
Good form!
It doesn't feel right if we're both playing with each other. Come over here, will you?
You better be enjoying it. Otherwise I may have to punt you.
Whaaat? You're still going?
Maybe I'll try to outlast you.
I'm a little worried that I'll make things awkward...
You're doing great, ~target~!
Consider this your warm up before the real training begins.
I'm liking this result.
Hey, stop staring!
For someone who lost you sure are happy about it.
And I thought I'd be ok with it at this point...
At least if I'm fully clothed it's not too embarassing.
You're really starting to tempt me, ~name~.
Sure looks fun... not that I'd want to try it or anything?
(D-don't think, feel. Dammit this is harder than I thought!)
Hey, you hanging in there OK?
Since this is like a workout, you need to keep your own pace.
Is it possible to carbo load for this?
For someone who lost you sure are happy about it.
Stop if you want but it's not like I'd want you to...
Wow, I never would have imagined it being this intense.
This is more intense than a weight training session.
Remember, you gotta clean up after yourself.
Are you okay, ~name~?
Not bad, but not impressive either.
(Nothing else to see here, Chie. just focus on the game.)
How do you like it, ~target~?
(I can't lie, this does look pretty damn hot)
Might as well stretch it off. That was pretty much a workout after all.
Doesn't seem too exciting now that I've gotten off.
At least I get a good view.
Keep going, ~name~.
She's so ferocious. I don't think I can handle that...
Wow, I don't think I could ever match that. Mind showing me the ropes at some point?
This is not normal behavior. Are you secretly a shadow?
Guess I win this round! Feel free to try again after your training arc.
Even when you get dirty you're acting playful? What would we do without you?
Wait, whaaat? I mean, I don't need a backstory, do I?
I need a backstory? What's wrong with just enjoying the rush?
Well, it's not exactly tragic, but this one time, my friend was in danger, and I had to face a shadow of myself... yeah, it wasn't pretty.
Whoa, maybe you are my type.
Welcome to loserville, ~target~. Population, you!
No way! It must be the power of friendship!
Is that all? I figured you would put up more of a fight.
Where did all that fire go? Don't tell me you're all bark and no bite.
First round goes to me! Way to put up a fight, though.
Chie one, Mika zero!
Woohoo! It was even more fun watching her get eliminated from the sidelines.
You can't possibly mean... I guess Yu and Yosuke are the closest boys in my life, but I never would have imagined being romantic with them!
Does it have to be with a boy? Yukiko's been my friend ever since I was a kid, and I can't ever imagine my future without her.

Does it have to be with a boy? Rise, of course I mean Risette, the idol, she's been a great friend ever since she moved to Inaba and joined our team. And yet, there's something about her that really draws you in...
You know, for a while we all thought Naoto was a boy, but then things happened, and yet... oh jeez, I'm not falling for her, am I?
Was that really worth the training?
I need to train my composure some other way.
Well, see you later!
So that's what I gotta do? Geez...
Haha... no problem for me. I can do that in my sleep!
Pretty good, but I'm better.
I lasted longer than you? Guess I didn't need the training after all.
You finished before someone who hated this? Wow, you suck.
This can't be! How can I lose like this?!
I'd rather be on the Midnight channel...
Well, it was fun while it lasted.
Next time I'm going even further than this!
You can look but just, don't look too hard.
I'll just start slow and then...
H-here goes nothing...
(The final step of my training. I just gotta see it through.)
I've still got my eye on you, Moon.
Do you care about this? Since you are sort of a hologram and all...
Wow, officer, you sure are pretty lax about this.
Hey, officer Li, this won't put me on probation, would it?
Hey, ~player~, don't let me distract you!
Keep going, ~player~. You still got a game to play.
If you're nervous, just watch and do what I do. Simple, right?
(Don't be intimidated Chie. Everyone has to do this eventually.)
(Don't be intimidated Chie. Just imagine everyone in their underwear.)
Breathe in... and out...
See that? The Midnight Channel said I discarded womanhood, but I've still got it right here!
Hmm... Yeah.
I seem to be having some trouble. Maybe I should go harder.
Maybe I should do it more often.
I don't know what I was so concerned about. This feels nice!
At some point, I'd love to try this with something longer.
Hey, ~player~, you like it? ...Actually, don't answer.
I guess I was all worried for nothing...
I should do this more often...
Maybe I should find a more private place.
Oh wow, this may be even better than kung fu.
Would this be enough to count as my workout for the day?
I don't even care who's watching anymore! I'm proud of doing this!
Oh yeah, right there!
Huhh... Huhh...
I-I think I'm close--!
This must be my sweet spot!
Aaah! Yes!
Why am I so tickilish? It's almost as if something's coming!
Clear the way!
Here it comes...!
Yes!!!
Oh, fuck me, yes!
Kyah!!!
Well, that was fun while it lasted. We oughta do a real wrestling show some day.
I gotta hand it to you, Polly. Never thought a ghost of all things would have given me the confidence I needed.
Ah, sorry, Futaba, I may have gotten a bit carried away, ahaha...
(I hope I didn't embarass myself in front of Leonie. She doesn't look flustered so that's a good sign...)
It's strange, Yusuke, even though you saw me finish, I don't feel like punting you this time.
Man, who needs rivalries anyway? We should totally hang out! I know the best places for ramen.
Don't be afraid of yourself, Sayaka. If I could figure it out, so can you.
I hope that wasn't too weird, Sayaka. But next time you feel self doubt, just remember if I can figure things out, so can you.
Wow, I... can't believe I just did that! I was a bit... worried, at first, about showing off this part of myself. But I get it now. It's just another side of me.
Well, officer, I never expected this to be a side of you. You're gonna have to show me around sometime.
I guess you aren't so bad after all, Nagatoro.
(I'm just glad I controlled myself. Nagatoro is quite a test of my patience.)
You know, maybe I should try being a navigator. I could totally shout things like "never give up! Trust your instincts!"
(Seems like I had nothing to worry about with Cammy. Was that really just a dark power I felt?)
How's that for a warmup, Mika? Maybe some day we'll duke it out for real!
When do we put our clothes back on? I mean we're out now.
I can't wait to tell everyone back home about this!
So, what now?
Now that I'm used to this place, I oughta invite someone here next time.
Eheh, I guess I oughta clean up now, don't I?
Would you believe that was the first time I ever got wet? It's just not something I've been too interested in.
Yawn... Are we almost done? It's ramen night at Junes.
You weren't too surprised, were you?
Hmm, Aiya's pretty late with her steak delivery. Oh well, I'll just make one at home!
You should give yourself more credit, Futaba! Look how many friends you've got!
I'm glad I won but I wish I didn't have to see that.
Thanks, Haru! Being ladylike may be nice, but I remembered that I just gotta be myself.
So, Moon, about your proposition...
You're always welcome to come us in Inaba! Just try not to spook any of the residents while you're at it.
So, Yusuke, ever wanted to come to Inaba?
See? I told you I wasn't taking anything off!
Wow, you guys suck! I didn't even break a sweat!
Well I won, but it sure didn't feel like it.
The most clutch victory you will ever see!
It doesn't get any more clutch than this! ...Right?
Don't think. Feel.
That was fun! I may actually come back for more.
We did it, Tomoe! Up top!
I gotta show off more often!
Sorry, my chest is off limits today!
Phew, that was too close.
I'll tell you what, I did way better than I thought!
Well, it's not a blowout but I'll take it.
You should give yourself more credit, Futaba! Look how many friends you've got!
Phantom, shmantom. The investigation team is gonna have a field day with this, hahaha, hehhhh...
Thank god she didn't get her way.
Sorry, Moon! You'll have to take that dirty mind elsewhere.
If you want to be dirty, go bother Yosuke.
I may have lost, but I consider stopping you from getting your way a win too...
Way to rope her in Ryuji! You think I have a chance with her?
Hey! Don't leave me out of this!
Thanks, Haru! Being ladylike may be nice, but I remembered that I just gotta be myself.
A new power is welling in me... My persona must be evolving again! Are you secretly a social link?
Later, dudes.
Well one thing's for sure, I definitely need more training...
As long as you don't see any shadows you're fine... I think.
